entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When threads have low free stack space, `StackSpiller` may infinite-loop through the thread pool #61757
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] `RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded` in `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #61756
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Malformed `testResults.xml` causing CI test runs to fail #61749
    7.0.0
  • Possible deadlock in ConfigurationManager in .NET 6 #61747
  • "Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005" crash when starting PowerShell 7.2 on Windows 11 #61740
  • .NET 4.8 - TLS / SCHANNEL / UseStrongCrypto #61739
  • System.MissingMethodException: Method not found: 'Void System.Text.Json.Serialization.Metadata.JsonObjectInfoValues`1.set_ObjectCreator(System.Func`1<!0>)'. with .NET Standard 2.0 #61737
  • Create maui specific runtime branch #61736
    6.0.x
  • JSON serializer code generator produces nullability warnings for constructor arguments #61734
  • crossgen2 asserts: "OwningType == other.OwningType" in MethodWithToken.CompareTo #61732
  • Provide default implementations for older Stream methods in the form of static helper methods #61730
    Future
  • Provide a built-in way to create APM methods from a Task-based method #61729
  • document WaitForExitAsync() Stdout/Stderr drain #61728
  • [API Proposal]: EnumConverter support for numeric/string in but always numeric out #61726
  • [wasm] Some Wasm.Build.Tests+AOT failing on windows #61725
    7.0.0
  • Using EmbeddedFileProvider throws "Operation is not supported on this platform" #61724
  • [wasm][aot] `System.Runtime.Tests` failing on Windows with `RuntimeError: null function or function signature mismatch` #61721
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Figure out a way to detect wasm+windows+aot for tests #61720
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.To Methods #61719
  • Apparent memory leak in .NET versions 5 and 6 when enumerating an IAsyncEnumerable. #61717
  • Buffer Overrun in System.Number.BigInteger #61714
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_Timeout_Loop_Throws(engine: Compiled) #61710
  • Test failure #61709
  • DateTime.ToString("d") cannot be parsed as a DateTime in Arabic #61708
    Future
  • [wasm] Improve native table generation. #61706
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Add ConnectionId to ConnectionBase #41110
    Future
  • .NET6 issue with Encoding.UTF8.GetString vs .NET5, .NET Core 3.1 #61744
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to build IHost when creating EF Migration with Minimal API dotnet 6 #60891
    6.0.x
  • System.Text.Json 6.0.0 package breaks builds with .Net SDK 3.1 #61602
  • Cannot change the ReadOnly file attribute #59406
    Future
  • FileInfo reports wrong attributes on OSX #61409
  • [release/6.0] We should enforce that services packages specify `ServicingVersion` when in a servicing release. #61694
    6.0.x
  • String.Format(formatProvider, "{0:N}", value) regression #61733
  • System.Text.Json: Method not found System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.FindFirstCharacterToEncodeUtf8 happening in Xamarin.Android #56544
    Future
  • suggestion: enable FileStream Length caching on non-Windows #60677
  • [API Proposal]: System.Collections.Generic.SortedList<TKey, TValue> should have SetByIndex(Int32,TValue) #58962
    Future
  • Sockets factories for Connection Abstractions #40044
    Future
  • [MONO][Interp] function call tests failed with SEGV with interpreter #54374
    7.0.0
  • Don't fail superpmi replay job if the only problem is MISSING data #61616
    7.0.0
  • [Perf -16%] System.Collections.CopyTo<String> (6) #37814
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add overloads to `Console.Write` that also take a `ConsoleColor` parameter #61731
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: List<T>.ForEach(Action<T>) -> IEnumerable.ForEach(Action<T>) #61727
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_RandomAccess #60869
    7.0.0
  • My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyFile Bug (It Changes LastWriteTime) #60923
  • SignalR issues due to lack of ISerializable and TimeZoneInfo support #1565
    Future
  • Named Mutex on Different Docker Containers #35968
    Future
  • ConfigurePrimaryHttpMessageHandler is not loading the specified HttpClientHandler in Azure Functions V3 Runtime #36493
    Future
  • system.text.json ignores [JsonConverter(..)] on [FromQuery] in ASP.NET #38939
    Future
  • Optimize the Skip() method for Utf8JsonReader #45200
    Future
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ConstructorTests_Span.ClassWithPrimitives #49634
    7.0.0
  • System.Xml.XmlException: Data at the root level is invalid. Line 1, position 1. #50781
    Future
  • XDocument Fails To Parse XML produced by Interop.Excel (finds non-existent illegal character) #53230
    Future
  • improve Immutable by removing or adding some checks #58977
    Future
  • Very basic findall against list literal is broken. #59358
  • .NET 5.0.5 SortedSet(IComparer).GetViewBetween(X,Y).Max returns invalid value #59640
  • HostedBackground service sometimes freeze #60067
    Future
  • Generate fast-path serialize logic for nullable structs #59719
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix #61560. #61755
    area-System.Buffers
  • Introduce non-shipped System.Runtime.Internal assembly #61754
    area-Infrastructure, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Extract ECAlgorithm from ECDsa and ECDiffieHellman #61753
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Rework startup in test-main.js #61752
    arch-wasm
  • Fix the only ilproj test that uses multiple command-line variants #61750
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update Area Owners for System.Data #61748
    area-Meta
  • [System.Text.Json] Move inline throw statements to `ThrowHelper` #61746
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Actually use TargetOS=AnyOS in the build-test-job. #61745
    area-Infrastructure
  • Convert Crypto P/Invokes to GeneratedDllImport. #61742
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.Data.Odbc, System.IO.Ports, System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController #61741
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Update DNNE version to 1.0.27 #61738
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for dumping and using precise debug info #61735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • prevent concurrent access to IO buffers on macOS #61723
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • Use char override Writer for System.Private.Xml #61722
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm][workload] Try to figure out how to support aot on net6.0 with a net7.0 sdk #61716
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Adding a test covering a really long near epsilon string #61715
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/6.0] disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #61713
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • JIT: support OSR for synchronized methods #61712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests verifying fast-path semantics for nullable structs #61711
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Adding support for the X86Base.Pause intrinsic on Mono #61707
    area-Codegen-meta-mono

Merged

  • src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update docker image #61217
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Skip HardwareIntrinsics/x86base/Pause tests on Mono #61743
  • Merge System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms to System.Security.Cryptography #61543
    area-System.Security
  • HostFactoryResolver - Increase default timeout to thirty seconds #61621
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • A few follow up changes to LookupTypeKey change #61718
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add packaging changes for System.Text.Json #61703
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Factor out and improve the vectorization of RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar #61490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [DllImportGenerator] Enable on projects without System.Memory and System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe #61704
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Remove XUnit reference metadata from tests I switched over last week #61691
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Refactoring CharEntityEncoderFallback for System.Private.Xml #60074
    area-System.Xml
  • Ignore missing data result from superpmi-replay run #61699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some unnecessary slicing from generated Regex code #61701
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Minor File.ReadAllBytes* improvements #61519
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Extend RegexCharClass.Canonicalize range inversion optimization #61562
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][aot] Fix the inclusion of generic instances when doing profile… #61627
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] renames and cleanup before modularization #61596
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable native ports package validation #61697
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • HostFactoryResolver - Increase default timeout and add env var option #61688
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Update SPCL to use GeneratedDllImport where possible. #61640
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • JIT: don't import IL for partial compilation blocks #61572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add [Fact] attributes to all remaining ilproj tests #61625
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` #57418
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Upload dasm files as artifacts for "asmdiffs pipeline" #61700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add single char lazy loop support to simplified Regex code gen #61698
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Add additional binary operations into the RangeCheck analysis. #61662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Don't use recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #61677
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Tie sdb agent lifetime to the ExecutionContext and simplify the api #61392
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow runtimeconfig StartupHooks and Environment StartupHooks to both be present #61461
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Remove race condition from DllImportGenerator build #61695
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update `GetPinnableReference()` usage in multi-step custom type marshalling #61539
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add a new supported signature for pinvokes #61667
    arch-wasm
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • [WIP] Enable stress log on Linux #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] Eval fixes for static class eval #61660
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Create runtime clone to manually kick off full test runs #61641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix handing of native types #61612
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [iOS] Follow up changes for 61590 #61670
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add a JsonWriterOptions.MaxDepth property #61608
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • CreateDirectory: eliminate some syscalls. #58799
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update area-owners to reflect Libraries Area Pod changes #61642
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix perf issues discovered in "For software performance, can you always trust inlining" blog #61408
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix invalid behavior of MoveToAttribute methods #60556
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix issue #60543 #60544
    area-System.Xml
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #61631
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • FileStatus.Unix/Process.Unix: align caching of user identity. #60160
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_DEFER_CLASS_INIT_TO_CTOR #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Fix parsing of ping error replies on raw sockets #61592
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • File.CopyTo: try to pre-allocate disk space for large destination files #61676
    area-System.IO, os-linux, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize SpanHelpers<T>.IndexOf #60974
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • [WIP]: Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make more extensive use of lvaGetDesc() #61494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Question: Is it valid IR for phi args with common dominator to share a phi arg? #1731

Closed

  • PublishSingleFile: "GenerateBundle" task failed unexpectedly #1730

PullRequests

Updated

  • Custom marshaller work. #1723
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for more unary and binary ops #1705
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add field to LclVarDsc to represent LLVM arg index #1716

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing `wasm-tools` Workload Changes Test Results #22655
  • dotnet --version completes with exit code 0 when global.json is malformed #22654
  • Upgrading to .NET6 breaks unit tests which launch 32-bit .NET processes #22647

Closed

  • Removed title #22584
  • Removed title #22585
  • dotnet --list-sdks shows empty although .Net core sdks are installed #14139
  • Suppress workload update notification from `dotnet run` #22571
    6.0.2xx
  • Consecutive installs should report installed workload #20085
    6.0.2xx
  • Cannot build v6.0.100 tag from source #22570

PullRequests

Created

  • Exclude runtimeidentifiers for runtimepack #22658
    Area-Workloads
  • Update Test project NuGetConfigDependentProject to current framework #22648
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove reference to PlatformAbstractions #22254
    Servicing-approved
  • Tell user when workload has already been installed #22557
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Blazor AOT Publish Tests #22477
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Change messages for ILLink #22636
    Area-ILLink
  • Use MessageImportance.Low for log statements. #22638
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22641
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Index of char is wrong while getting from the string using the String.IndexOf() #5442

Updated

  • [Open Question]: `required` parsing #5439

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Language-Version-History.md #5440

Merged

  • Clarify conversion rules for CallerArgumentExpression #5438
  • Update file-scoped-namespaces.md #5441

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ServiceHub CoreCLR is failing to load sqlite dlls. #57827
  • List-patterns: lowering assumes the conversion from int to Index will use the implicit conversion operator #57825
  • XML documentation preview #57820
  • False positive IDE0060 for partial method with SG #57814
  • VS 20221 .editorConfig not detecting custom settings #57812
  • Format document does not add white spaces field/property assignment (VS 2022 RTM) #57811
  • List-patterns: can we avoid unwrapping placeholders manually during lowering? #57810

Closed

  • MSBuildWorkspaceTests.Test_OpenProjectReferencingPortableProject Test failure #41456

PullRequests

Created

  • [wip] allow lsp handlers with different type arguments #57834
    Area-IDE
  • Fix deadlock switching the project context dropdown #57833
    Area-IDE
  • Remove handling of certain BCL binaries from our build #57832
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Tweak SemaphoreDisposer to null out the held semaphore #57831
    Area-Compilers
  • Make GetDocumentWithFrozenPartialSemantics asynchronous #57830
    Area-IDE
  • Fix deadlock during solution load #57829
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Cache built skeleton assemblies so they can be reused on next launch without rebuilding them. #57826
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Use test accessor task instead of async operation to wait for LSP server shutdown in tests #57824
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Revert "Merge pull request #57617 from dibarbet/lsp_queue_task" #57823
    Area-IDE
  • Use the .NET 6.0 SDK for building (Arcade7) #57822
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Disable caching that is not necessary during a list pattern evaluation. #57818
    Area-Compilers
  • Use InvariantCulture for generated log file name in FileLogger ctor #57816
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Do not call IsFullyLoadedAsync from JTF #57813
    Area-IDE
  • Add back option to allow users to disable async lightbulbs #57808
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57807
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57809
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57804
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57784
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Use helpers in param-nullchecking emit #57615
    Area-Compilers
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Add missing test for CallerArgumentExpression #57805
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Simplify implementation of SourceGeneratedFileItemSource #57691
    Area-IDE
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • Change the title of configure severity to resources file #57795
    Area-IDE
  • Port BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit to the new test harness #57738
    Area-IDE
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Use the .NET 6.0 SDK for building (Arcade7) #57637
    Area-Infrastructure
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • [17.0] Overload resolution was ignoring HasTypeArgumentInferredFromFunctionType for calls in expanded form #57737
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Ignore function types in return type inference #57713
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.0
  • Use MSBuildLocator for tests #57613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cover additional cases in implicit object creation analyzer #57679
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove weakref that telemetry indicates has no impact at all. #57803
    Area-IDE
  • Run HasRefactoringsAsync out-of-process #40672
    Area-IDE
  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `UseStaticFiles` should display the default PhysicalFileProvider default path when using a constructor that doesn't override the default `IFileProvider` #38481
  • [Blazor] CascadingTypeParameter problem #38479
  • Use overload of StreamResponseBodyFeature that accepts the previous feature in BrowserRefresh #38477
  • Slow Blazor wasm build in Visual Studio 2022 .NET 5.0 based #38476
  • Blazor httpcontext is renewed upon refreshing the page #38475
  • Not Able to Navigate Custom URL using GetUriWithQueryParameter #38478
  • Idea: .NET 6 Minimal Api - Set dynamic generated access modifier for "Program" class as a "public" not "internal" #38474
  • Blazor Server: Websocket problems with WAN-optimization / change port for SignalR / websocket connection #38472
  • InputDate with Type=InputDateType.Time and step=1 doesn't accept keyboard input #38471
  • EEFileLoadException when executing Services.AddMvc after upgrading from NET5.0 to NET6.0 #38469
  • Excessive memory usage using endpoint.MapControllerRoute - never ending story (continuation of #30092) #38468
  • TaskCanceled Exception thrown from Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer.JwtBearerHandler class #38467
  • Razor runtime view compilation via environment variable not working in .NET 6 #38465
  • Core-React not started API(Server Side) #38463
  • InvalidOperationException on POST of form with large data #38462
  • Blazor to run in WASMEdge #38461
  • open a page as modal? #38459

Closed

  • Blazor wasm hosted Project Integrity errors on Deployment to Azure App service #37861
  • Recommend `Playwright Sharp` in Integration testing docs #31669
    7.0-preview1
  • ProducesAttribute hides HTTP 404 / behavior is counterintuitive #25385
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Facebook crawler rewrite doesn't work - issue with query string rewrite #5998
    Backlog
  • [Kestrel] Allow UTF-8 characters in request URL #17402
    Backlog
  • Virtualize component is missing support to virtualize DataTable.Rows #37875
    7.0-preview1
  • IAsyncEnumerable with System.Text.Json in IIS 10 - problem #38460
  • Auto update or refresh the token in blazor to signalr? #38325
  • When using .net core 3.1 runtime with System.Text.Json 6.0.0 the serialization doesn't honor new API. #38438
  • error trying to run dotnet watch #38303
  • Dedupe Razor helper classes across relevant repos #33058
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Visual Studio 2022 Launches Chrome - Only with limited features when running standalone React.Js projects #38464
  • Flaky test: InputDateInteractsWithEditContext_DateTimeLocalInput #34884
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Quarantining `InputDateInteractsWithEditContext_TimeInput` #35018
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Blazor Wasm Hosted Project : API Call not working, Returns Index.html for all API Calls #38396
  • Test failures: NavigateOnSubmitWorks, CanHandleClearedChild after SDK update #34857
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.WebAssemblyAuthenticationTests.CanPreserveApplicationState_DuringLogIn #35108
    6.0-docs-infra
  • .NET 6 Minimal API - WebApplicationFactory doesn't see custom settings json file values #38435
  • Blazor action and function object type is not disposed. #38423
  • Document pattern for prerendering head section #37293
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Visual Studio 2022 Couldn't start the SPA development server with command 'npm start' #38398
  • Perf improvement: json_netty #38391
  • WebApplicationFactory does not resolve the custom configured SQL Provider, but the one from Startup #28831
    Backlog
  • HttpResponseStreamWriter should override TextWriter.WriteLineAsync(string) #38210
    7.0-preview1
  • Make IValueProvider async #38451
  • reopen #38192. Bug not solved #38458
  • CSS isolation will not be closed. How can we really isolate? #38348

PullRequests

Created

  • chore - Use `HttpMethods` #38466
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Create ReleasePlanning.md #37940
    Docs, area-infrastructure
  • Run InputDate E2E tests on WebAssembly only. Fixes #35018, #34884 #38473
    area-blazor
  • Override base implementations of WriteLineAsync in HttpResponseStreamWriter #38387
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    Working, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Try Ubuntu 21.10 #38456
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] Update Docker images, queues, etc. #38427
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Async DiagnosticsClient methods can hang on Windows if target process is unresponsive #2711
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Standardize on new two-line license header #2758

Merged

  • Use non-infinite timeout for async connection. #2739

Updated

  • Add duration as an option to dotnet-counters and fix a null reference… #2755

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement Navigating, Navigated events in WebViewHandler #3440
  • Winforms like designer with optional hot reload xaml window #3439
  • MDI #3438
  • [Bug] [Android] Button in FlexLayout not clickable #3435
  • MauiRazorClassLibrary sometimes doesn't build when building the SLN, causing StaticWebAssets to fail #3434

Closed

  • Rename our XXXServiceProviders to XXXFactories #882
  • Update or remove repro.md #2977

PullRequests

Created

  • Correctly dispose the test dispatchers #3436

Merged

  • Added meta and icons for item templates #3262
    area/templates 📄
  • Update the Windows App SDK to 1.0 #3430
  • Use the Default Button Styles (Windows 11 Styles) #3363
  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Core] Rename XXXServiceProviders to XXXFactories #3368
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Add `repro.md` to issue template #3427
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Build projects in parallel #3428
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [WiP] Fix Scoping of MauiContext as it relates to Modal Pages #3361
    do-not-merge
  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools
  • [Core,Controls] Remove legacy Log and use ILogger #3401
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [iOS] Button border properties #3411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Core] Implement IsReadOnly property in SearchBar #3391
    area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore 6 InMemory throw exception on ignored type lookup #26731
  • Calling SqliteConnection from Microsoft.Data.Sqlite v6.0.0 throws TypeInitializationException #26729
  • Scale is not considered when converting decimal to string #26726
  • Migration bundle not honoring --connection setting #26724
  • EF Core 6 Unable to set up a many-to-many relationship between '' and '' because one or both of the navigations don't have a corresponding CLR property #26721

Closed

  • Scaffold-DbContext incorrectly maps a view column that is of type (datetime2(7), null) to C# DateTime instead of DateTime? #26727
  • Temporal Tables support for InMemoryDatabase #26717
  • Issues with publishing and Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.dll #26694

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Fix double negation in SQL generation #26734
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Test on .NET Framework #26733
  • Update to Mac 11 image #26732
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26728
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Test mechanism to automatically rewrite baselines in source code #26723

Merged

  • Update the foreign key builder after IsRequired() #26719
    Servicing-approved
  • Use the correct builder when attaching indexes on nested owned entity types #26720
    Servicing-approved
  • Return null schema for unmapped entity types. #26730
    Servicing-approved
  • Remove Windows/Ubuntu from helix testing as other pipeline covers it #26725
    auto-merge
  • Query: Introduce method for providing brackets around SqlExpression b… #26660
    auto-merge
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.22.1 to 3.23.0 #26693
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.3 to 8.0.4 #26692
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Update daily builds for EF7 #26722

Updated

  • Put parentheses around IS NULL for non-bool operands #26653
  • Update command to set connection string for SqlServer on Ubuntu #26055
  • Query: Avoid parethesis around binary operations when used with AND/OR #26661
  • Fix ValueGenerated On Add Or Update, , make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26713
  • Query: Defer inline-ing owned navigation expansion till all joins are… #26641
    auto-merge
